string-array.item: What is the manufacturer of your first car?
In which city did your parents meet?

resources.string:
FoodNav is developed for education purposes only. 
We are ABSOLUTE NOOBS and this is our first project. 

This application is a reflection of basic knowledge learnt in class as well as exploration of technologies made available.


All data used in FoodNav is fictitious, it is meant to illustrate design concept and application workflow. There is no data validation and verification, data is not encrypted in transit hence users are STRONGLY ENCOURAGED to use fictitious information. 

All information entered by users (excluding photos) will be stored in MS Azure SQL Server till the end of OCTOBER 2024, and there will be no distribution of information.


We appreciate your patience and kind contribution of effort to review and rate our work. We will continue to learn and build better and robust mobile application.


Thank you!
